The First Step will change outdated laws that contribute to mass incarceration, including:
-lowering mandatory minimum sentences for drug offenses
-eliminating the life-behind-bars “three strikes” law
-ending stacking of sentencing that disproportionally affects people of color. https://twitter.com/pewtrusts/status/1075391638791512065 …

This bill ends juvenile incarceration in solitary confinement and provides grants to improve drug treatment for offenders. Also, it will ensure parents are placed within 500 miles of their kids. These are important steps to create a more empathetic criminal justice system. pic.twitter.com/0nAjt7Hzq3

The First Step Act pushes for long overdue and better care for incarcerated women. This bill would: 
✔️bans the shackling of pregnant women in custody 
✔️provides free feminine hygiene products to female prisoners pic.twitter.com/0cGLY9J5CN

The FIRST STEP ACT is a prime example of what we can accomplish when we come together to solve a pressing problem. This bill will address much needed reforms in our criminal justice system, including ways to end mass incarceration and prison overcrowding. https://www.vox.com/future-perfect/2018/12/18/18140973/first-step-act-criminal-justice-reform-senate-congress …
